items.title: Ticket sold in Arkansas wins $1.8B Powerball jackpot -- 2nd biggest ever
items.description: A ticket sold in Arkansas matched all six numbers to win a $1.817 billion jackpot -- the second biggest U.S. lottery ever, according to Powerball.
